type.description: The type of the resource object.

requestType.description: The type of the authorization request.

status.description: The status of the authorization request.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the authorization request was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the authorization request was updated.

validTo.description: The date and time when the authorization request is valid to.

requestedBy.description: The party identifier of the actor requesting the authorization request

requestedFrom.description: The party identifier representing the owner of the access or rights for which the authorization request is being requested.

requestedFromName.description: The name of the organization or person who the authorization request is requested from.

requestedTo.description: The party identifier of the person authorized to review and approve the authorization request on behalf of the owner.

requestedForMeteringPointId.description: The unique identifier of the metering point associated with the authorization request.

requestedForMeteringPointAddress.description: The address of the metering point associated with the authorization request.

balanceSupplierContractName.description: The unique name of a supplier contract associated with the authorization request.

approvedBy.description: The party identifier of the person who approved the authorization request
